articles.title: NASCAR comes back to console video games, with the Unreal Engine - Polygon
articles.description: Motorsport Games announced Aug. 11 that NASCAR 21: Ignition, made with Unreal Engine 4, would launch Oct. 28 for PlayStation 4, Windows PC, and Xbox One, with a free upgrade to newer consoles arriving later. The game follows last year’s disappointing NASCAR H…
articles.content:
